entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 2:48 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm near Lake Ontario. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
